script_des: This is a common unit conversion tool, please mark the unit in parentheses after the field name, so that the plugin will automatically extract the unit type, e.g. mass unit(g), length unit(km), please check for details
select_field: Please select the unit field name (source field) that needs to be converted
select_target: Please select the unit field name (target field) that needs to be converted
transform_fail: Transformation failed, transformed {{transformNum}} pieces of data
transform_success: Transformation succeeded, {{transformNum}} pieces of data have been transformed
transform_error: Conversion failed, please check unit type
